Class Album

    • model.Album
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Album
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class creates an album and defines its functionality
    Author:
    Benjamin Ker (bk375), Jake Karasik (jak451)
    See Also:
